meanings.definition: A condition characterized by thickened, white patches on the mucous membranes of the mouth or other areas of the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with leukoplakias after noticing white patches in their mouth.
meanings.sent2: Leukoplakias can sometimes be a sign of oral health issues.
meanings.sent3: The cartoon character had leukoplakias on its tongue, making it hard to speak clearly.
meanings.sent4: The snowy field resembled a vast expanse of leukoplakias under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a haunting portrait depicting the eerie beauty of leukoplakias.
